room_title: Escape room "Project MK-ULTRA" by Escape Game Knoxville in Knoxville
room_description:
The CIA's mind control project, MK-ULTRA, has failed. Or has it...? It's the mid 80's, and you are a group of journalism students scheduled to interview a former Professor involved in the controversial project. You have been given a lead that rogue fringe scientists have picked up where the CIA left off.
When you reach his office, he has disappeared and left a mysterious note giving you an unfamiliar set of instructions on how to get the data you need and escape before the evidence is lost forever. Will you be able to recover the secret data in time or will you become part of the experiment?
